title: Otoriyose Ouji Iida Yoshimi
original_name: おとりよせ王子飯田好実
sinopse:
The series revolves around 26-year-old Yoshimi Iida, an ordinary worker who has a secret no one knows about: he lives for eating delicious food from around Japan that he orders online and has delivered to his house at night.

(Source: ANN)

Included one-shot:
Volume 3: Sokosoko Aishiteru
